items.name: Belhaven Grey 9 Piece Dining Set w/Table & 8 Chairs

custom_attributes.value:
The Belhaven Grey 9 Piece Dining Set is a stunning combination of coastal, cottage, and modern farmhouse design elements, making it a versatile centerpiece for any dining space. Crafted from Rubberwood Solids and Flat Cut Oak Veneers, the set features a weathered plank finish with wire brushing, distressing, and worn edges, giving it an authentic, timeworn appeal. The extension trestle table includes two 18-inch leaves, making it ideal for hosting dinner parties or holiday gatherings, comfortably seating up to 10 people. The trestle base adds a classic farmhouse touch, while the six Windsor style spindle-back side chairs and two armchairs, finished in black, introduce a stylish contrast and high-design aesthetic. With its timeless appeal and functionality, this dining set effortlessly elevates the look of any dining room.


9 PIECE DINING SET INCLUDES:

Extension Trestle Dining Table w/2 18" Extension Leaves

(6) Windsor Side Chairs

(2) Windsor Arm Chairs


FEATURES:

  • Constructed of Rubberwood/Oak Veneers
  • Table Finish: Weathered Plank/Grey
  • Chair Finish: Black
  • Seating Capacity: up to 10
  • 2 - 18" Leaves: 1 Leaf expands table from 86"-104"; Both Leaves expand table to 122"!
Belhaven Grey 9 Piece Dining Set w/Extension Table & 8 Chairs

items.name: Kirkwood Black Rectangle Dining Set With Table and 4 Chairs

custom_attributes.value:
Gather around in timeless elegance with the Kirkwood Black Rectangle Dining Set With Table and 4 Chairs—a bold yet welcoming ensemble designed to bring people together, meal after meal. Whether you're enjoying a quiet breakfast or hosting a lively dinner party, this five-piece set creates a space that feels both stylish and personal. Crafted from durable wood in a rich black finish, the rectangular table anchors your dining area with its confident silhouette and clean, modern lines. It offers the perfect balance of form and function—spacious enough to seat four comfortably, yet thoughtfully scaled for cozy dining rooms, apartments, or breakfast nooks. What truly makes the Kirkwood set special is its blend of timeless style and practical comfort. The chairs feature gently curved backs and soft, padded seats upholstered in a linen-inspired neutral fabric, creating a look that’s both refined and approachable. The striking contrast between the sleek black frame and light upholstery adds warmth and visual depth to any space. This dining set is designed to make everyday moments feel special. Its durable construction promises years of reliable use, while the versatile color palette makes styling a breeze. Whether you're serving up a casual weeknight dinner or entertaining weekend guests, the Kirkwood dining set becomes a natural gathering place—a backdrop for connection, laughter, and comfort.


Features

  • 5-piece dining set includes 1 rectangular table and 4 matching chairs
  • Solid wood construction with a deep black finish
  • Padded chair seats upholstered in a neutral, linen-textured fabric
  • Clean lines and modern silhouette with timeless appeal
  • Scaled to fit small to medium dining spaces
  • Easy to pair with a variety of color palettes and décor styles
  • Designed for comfort and everyday durability
Kirkwood Black Rectangle Dining Set With Table and 4 Chairs 5311DT5

items.name: Brookhaven 9 Piece Dining Set w/Table, 6 Side Chairs & 2 Arm Chairs

custom_attributes.value:
The Brookhaven Dining Table with 6 Side Chairs and 2 Arm Chairs combines classic elegance with modern functionality. Crafted from high-quality hardwood solids and veneers, the table features a warm, weathered finish that enhances the natural beauty of the wood grain. Its design includes gracefully turned legs and intricate detailing, giving it a timeless and sophisticated appeal. Spacious enough for family gatherings or dinner parties, the table comfortably seats eight, with six side chairs and two arm chairs. The chairs are upholstered for added comfort, while the arm chairs at each end of the table provide a stately touch. Their curved backs and finely detailed legs complement the table’s design, creating a cohesive, polished look.

The Brookhaven set brings an inviting atmosphere to any dining room, perfect for both casual meals and formal occasions. Its sturdy construction ensures long-lasting durability, making it a versatile and charming centerpiece for your home.


Features:

  • Dining Set Includes: Dining Table, 4 Upholstered Side Chairs, 2 Upholstered Arm Chairs
  • Crafted from poplar solids and flat cut elm veneers
  • Vintage linen and rustic dark elm finish
  • Includes 1- 18" leaf


Chair Dimension

  • Side Chair Dimensions: 20”W x 24”D x 40”H
  • Arm Chair Dimensions: 23”W x 24”D x 40”H

items.name: Nelling Dining Set w/Table & 2 Side Chairs

custom_attributes.value:
Elevate your dining space with the Nelling Dining Set by Signature Design by Ashley, showcasing a farmhouse-inspired style with a casual vibe. This set features a 42" round dining table paired with two side chairs, perfect for creating an intimate dining experience. The table boasts a fresh white finish with a dark brown wood tone top, offering a gently weathered charm that exudes warmth and character. Its round design promotes great flow and a friendly, inviting feel, making it ideal for gatherings and conversations. The dining chairs complement the table beautifully with their metal nailhead accents on the backs, adding a touch of design flair. Designed with smaller living spaces in mind, the Nelling Dining Set is a perfect choice for those seeking style and charm without sacrificing functionality.

4 Piece Dining Set Includes:

  • Two-tone Round Dining Room Table Top: Dimensions 42"W
  • Dining Room Table Base: Dimensions 30.5"W x 30.5"D x 27.75"H
  • Dining Room Side Chair (x2): Dimensions 17.38"W x 22.25"D x 37.5"H

FEATURES:

  • Made of wood, white oak veneer and engineered wood
  • Two-tone finish (painted white and dark brown oak-tone)
  • Weathered wood grain texture
  • Metal nailhead accents on dining chairs
Nelling Dining Set w/Table & 2 Side Chairs by Signature Design by Ashley D287

Compact in size but bold in style, the Vault Round Chairside Table offers a sculptural take on everyday function. This eye-catching piece features a round cast resin top with a realistic concrete look, perfectly paired with a soft mink grey wood base. The open arched design of the base echoes architectural forms, creating a dynamic silhouette that fits beautifully beside a sofa, reading chair, or bed.

Its compact footprint makes it ideal for smaller spaces, while the two-tone finish brings just the right touch of modern refinement.


FEATURES & BENEFITS

  • Two-tone design: Concrete-look top paired with a warm wood base for stylish contrast
  • Cast resin top: Offers the visual weight and texture of concrete without the heaviness
  • Architectural wood base: Arched design adds visual interest and structural elegance
  • New Traditional style: Clean lines and subtle curves for a versatile, timeless look
  • Protective floor glides: Helps prevent scratching or scuffing on floors
  • Compact and versatile: Great for use as a lamp table, bedside piece, or accent surface
  • Dimensions: 26"W x 26"D x 26"H (66 x 66 x 66 cm)
  • Weight: 51.81 lbs

The Vault Chairside Table brings strength, balance, and a quiet sense of style—perfect for modern spaces with an architectural edge.

The Newport Camel Leather Sofa from Leather Italia is a stunning piece that exudes luxury and sophistication. Part of the Newport collection, it showcases a sleek silhouette with a thin, pinched seam track arm, embodying the essence of mid-century modern design. The richly colored, camel brown semi-aniline dyed leather upholstery is complemented by a wood base, enhancing its elegant aesthetic. Crafted with pure aniline dyed leather, this sofa offers instant comfort as it breathes and quickly adjusts to body temperature. The result is a sumptuously comfortable seating experience that truly epitomizes luxury. Perfect for any living area, the Newport Camel Leather Sofa is a timeless addition that effortlessly elevates the ambiance of any space.

FEATURES:

  • 100% Semi-Aniline Leather Covering: Camel
  • Track arm with tapered wood legs
  • Modern leather will not crack or peel
  • It stretches and retains its shape without sagging
  • It resists sun and heat damage
  • Pirelli Webbing Seat Construction for supreme durability.
  • Attached Back Cushions
  • Loose Seat Cushions
Leather Italia Newport Camel Leather Sofa 1669-6394-03177137

items.name: Butler Brown Top Grain Leather Sofa

custom_attributes.value:
The Butler Brown Top Grain Leather Sofa from Leather Italia offers classic design styling, with a touch of modern flair. The beautifully sculpted rolled arms, detailed nail-head trim, ornate wooden feet, and long lasting comfort will make this sofa sure to impress.

Features:

  • Top Grain Leather
  • Sculpted rolled arms
  • Detailed nail-head trim
  • Ornate wooden feet
  • Premium kiln dried hardwood laminate
  • Pirelli webbing on base for superior strength & durability.
  • High resiliency elastic webbing supports back cushions
  • Seat & back cushions attached
  • Multiple rows of encapsulated coil springs in seat core
  • High resiliency polyurethane foam for shaping & support
  • Lining cloth on seat platform
  • Channel sewn breathable woven bag w/ blown fiber filling
  • Fiber wrap for seat comfort & support
  • Elastic cloth separates springs from foam
  • Part of the Georgetowne Collection
Butler Brown Top Grain Leather Sofa by Leather Italia 1669-2239-036618
Shop the Butler Brown Top Grain Leather Sofa by Leather Italia at Woodstock Furniture & Mattress Outlet

Generously scaled and richly versatile, this Rilynn Linen Sofa by Benchcraft exemplifies the best in timeless classic style. It's splendidly tailored with transitional roll arms, for a look that's traditional yet far from stuffy. Light, fresh and loaded with multi-textural interest, the sofa's soft chenille upholstery is pure pleasure for the senses. Accent pillows with soothing, neutral tones are a natural fit. Pair with other pieces from the Rilynn Collection to add a warm & inviting look to your living space you're sure to enjoy for years to come!

FEATURES:

  • Corner-blocked frame
  • Attached back and reversible seat cushions
  • High-resiliency foam cushions wrapped in thick poly fiber
  • Accent pillows included
  • Pillows with soft polyfill
  • Polyester upholstery with slub linen weave
  • Exposed feet with faux wood finish
  • Platform foundation system resists sagging 3x better than spring system after 20, 000 testing cycles by providing more even support
  • Smooth platform foundation maintains tight, wrinkle-free look without dips or sags that can occur over time with sinuous spring foundations
Shop the Rilynn Linen Sofa by Benchcraft at Woodstock Furniture & Mattress Outlet
